sentences.en: Contact the Coastguard immediately if you see a boat in trouble.
sentences.cn: 如看到船只遇险，请立即通知海岸警卫队。

sentences.en: Mr Clelford was then able to email the coastguard and ask for assistance.
sentences.cn: 议员克莱尔福德当时能够电子邮件海岸警卫队和请求协助.

sentences.en: The captain of the sinking ship used flares to attract the attention coastguard.
sentences.cn: 船开始下沉时,我们发出闪光信号以唤起人们注意.

sentences.en: The captain of the sinking ship used flares to attract the attention of the coastguard.
sentences.cn: 轮船正在下沉,船长向海岸巡逻队发出闪光信号求救.

sentences.en: The coastguard cutter cruise along the coast look for smuggler.
sentences.cn: 海岸警卫队缉私艇沿海巡逻搜寻走私犯.

sentences.en: The coastguard cutter cruised along the coast looking for smugglers.
sentences.cn: 水上警察缉私船沿海巡逻搜寻走私犯.

sentences.en: The Coastguard needs to decipher garbled messages in a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 海岸警卫队需要在几分钟内解读这些含混不清的信息。
位于斯托诺韦的海岸警卫队驻地
海岸警卫队已接到报警。

sentences.en: The ship was identified, and its name and position were reported to the coastguard.
sentences.cn: 那艘船已找到，其名字和位置已报告给海岸警卫队。

sentences.en: The skipper notified the coastguard of the tragedy.
sentences.cn: 船长向海岸警卫队报告了这起灾难。

sentences.en: The survivors were lifted off by two helicopters, one from the Coastguard and one from the RAF.
sentences.cn: 幸存者被两架直升机送走，一架是海岸警卫队的，一架是英国皇家空军的。

sentences.en: They call themselves the Volunteer Coastguard of Somalia - and it's not hard to see why.
sentences.cn: 他们称自己为索马里海岸警卫志愿者,不难看出他们为什么这么称呼自己.

trans.tran_cn: 海岸警卫队，海岸警卫队队员
trans.tran_en: the organization that helps swimmers and ships that are in danger and helps to prevent illegal activities around the coast
